text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    254373007Ann Arbor Hodgkin's disease tumor staging system (tumor staging)
    254374001Ann Arbor non-Hodgkin's lymphoma tumor staging system (tumor staging)
    254375000Cotswolds Hodgkin's disease tumor staging system (tumor staging)
    254371009St Jude's non-Hodgkin's lymphoma staging system (tumor staging)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl
    CodeDisplay
    C141189Lugano Classification Adult Hodgkin Lymphoma by AJCC v8 Stage
    C141178Lugano Classification Childhood Hodgkin Lymphoma by AJCC v8 Stage
    C141158Lugano Classification Adult Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma by AJCC v8 Stage

name: LymphomaStagingMethodVS
title: Lymphoma Staging System Value Set
description: Staging Systems used to stage lymphomas (Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's).
